name: MoGraph VR Gallery Part 1
description:
Blur the Lines in Dance Virtual Reality: Gallery One for Oculus Quest
The motion graphics VR Gallery is now available for Oculus Quest with an expanded scene and enhanced navigation! Two additional galleries have been added with additional dancers @hhope.ffrench and @jennifer.raelynn who join @elaments, @april_falcon, @passiondweller, @jacindaratcliffe, @Katie.lebron, @purus_motus, @jazzerina26 and @betherina_87. Download the free Quest and updated PCVR scene below.
